instructions.title: How To Delete Your Groupon Account
instructions.before: Deleting your Groupon Account is Easy. You can either log onto Groupon from a Computer Browser and Navigate to the Help Section or email **support@groupon.com**. You cannot Delete Groupon from within the Mobile App.
instructions.after: You should receive a Reply to your Deletion email within 48 hours.

qnAnswers.question: What happens when I delete my Groupon Account?
qnAnswers.answer: Your information will be removed from Groupon and you will lose access to your account.

qnAnswers.question: Can I delete added Groupon items?
qnAnswers.answer: No. There is currently no way to delete an item once it has been created.

qnAnswers.question: What happens when I edit a product?
qnAnswers.answer: Anytime you edit a product—including product title, price, or description—you have to resubmit it for review before it can go back on the site. The only editable field that does not require re-approval is the product quantity.

steps: Log on to the Groupon Website (https://www.groupon.com/).  If you are already logged in, doing so will open the Groupon Homepage.
Click No, I still need Help
Type a Deletion Request, then Click I'm Not a Robot, then Click Send
